summary_en: This podcast transcript offers a deep dive into behavioral economics through the conversation between Tim Ferriss, Nick Kokonas, and Nobel laureate Richard Thaler. Thaler, known for his contributions to behavioral economics, challenges traditional economic models that assume perfect rationality and selfishness. He highlights the limitations of these models, which often fail to account for human behavior in real-world scenarios. The discussion covers key concepts like loss aversion, the winner's curse, and the importance of fairness in economic decisions. Kokonas shares practical examples from his business ventures, demonstrating how behavioral economics principles can be applied to solve real-world problems. The conversation also touches on the replication crisis in psychology and the enduring relevance of behavioral economics anomalies. Thaler's new book, co-authored with Alex Imas, revisits these anomalies to see if they hold up under scrutiny. The podcast is a fascinating exploration of how understanding human behavior can lead to better economic theories and more effective business strategies.
summary_zh: 这段播客访谈记录通过蒂姆·费里斯、尼克·科科纳斯和诺贝尔经济学奖得主理查德·塞勒的对话，深入探讨了行为经济学。塞勒以行为经济学的贡献闻名，挑战了传统经济模型中关于人类理性和自私的假设。他指出，这些模型常常无法解释现实中的人类行为。讨论涵盖了损失厌恶、赢家诅咒和经济决策中的公平性等关键概念。科科纳斯分享了他从商业实践中获得的实例，展示了行为经济学原理如何解决现实问题。对话还触及心理学中的复制危机以及行为经济学异常现象的持久相关性。塞勒与阿莱克斯·伊马斯合著的新书重新审视这些异常现象，以检验它们是否经得起时间考验。这段播客是一场关于如何通过理解人类行为来改进经济理论和商业策略的精彩探索。
best_quote_en: It might be the guys that are in that Uber for five grand, but even they are going to be a little pissed. But more importantly to Uber, if they did that — the thing is, at the time, when they would have these surges of 10X, they were not making any money off of that, it would be fleeting. So, they'd make a little bit of money just like if Nick had sold one dinner reservation for 10 grand. Yeah, he'd make 10 grand but he'd have thousands of people writing articles.
best_quote_zh: 也许那些坐着5000美元的Uber的人会有点生气。但更重要的对Uber来说，如果他们那样做了——当时，当他们出现10倍的涨价时，他们并没有从中赚到任何钱，只是昙花一现。他们可能赚到一点钱，就像尼克卖出一份1万美元的晚餐预订一样。是的，他会赚到1万美元，但会有成千上万的人写文章批评他。

title: 2025年国庆假期能做的6件小事
title_zh: 2025年国庆假期能做的6件小事
summary_en: This article offers a thoughtful guide to making the most of the upcoming National Day holiday by suggesting six meaningful activities. The author, who has been practicing this for years, emphasizes the importance of creating anticipation, reconnecting with one's body, engaging in deep conversations, experiencing awe through history, starting a personal memoir, and sharing insights online. Each activity is designed to bring joy, self-awareness, and connection, transforming the holiday into a period of personal growth rather than mere leisure. The article stands out for its practical advice and psychological insights, making it valuable for readers seeking to add depth to their holiday plans.
summary_zh: 文章为国庆假期提供六个充实生活的建议，从创建兴趣日历到重建身体感知，再到深度社交和历史体验，每个建议都蕴含深刻的心理洞察。作者通过这些活动引导读者在假期中寻找意义，超越普通休闲，实现自我成长。文章以亲切的语气分享个人实践，读来如沐春风，令人反思生活方式。
best_quote_en: People are creatures that live in anticipation. Often, what makes us happy isn't just how we're doing in the moment, but what hopes we hold for the future.
best_quote_zh: 人是一种活在期待里的生物。许多时候，令我们感到开心和幸福的，其实不仅仅是当下过得如何，更重要的或许是对未来抱持着什么样的希望。

title: Pregnancy skincare products target women at a vulnerable time. Do any work or do they just stretch the truth? | Antiviral
title_zh: 孕期护肤品在女性脆弱时刻锁定目标。它们真的有效还是在夸大其词？| 反病毒
summary_en: This article critically examines the efficacy of pregnancy skincare products that claim to prevent stretch marks and improve skin elasticity. The piece highlights the vulnerability of pregnant women to targeted marketing, often with exaggerated product claims. Dermatologists interviewed emphasize that genetics, age, and weight gain rate are the primary factors in stretch mark development, while surface applications like creams have little impact on the deeper dermal layer where stretch marks form. The article also discusses safe skincare practices during pregnancy, warning against retinoids and emphasizing the importance of basic moisturizing. It serves as a valuable guide for expectant mothers navigating the murky waters of pregnancy skincare marketing.
summary_zh: 本文深入剖析孕期护肤品宣称预防妊娠纹和增强皮肤弹性的效果。文章揭示了孕妇在面对精准营销时的脆弱性，以及产品夸大宣传的现象。受访皮肤科医生指出，遗传、年龄和体重增长速率是决定妊娠纹的主要因素，而表层护肤品对深层皮肤几乎无效。文章还探讨了孕期安全护肤实践，警告避免使用维A酸类产品，并强调基本保湿的重要性。这篇文章为期待生育的女性提供了在孕期护肤品营销迷雾中导航的宝贵指南。
best_quote_en: Keep your skin soft with whatever moisturiser agrees with you … it doesn’t have to be expensive.
best_quote_zh: 用任何你喜欢的保湿霜保持皮肤柔软… 不需要昂贵的产品。

title: Life is Short
title_zh: 生命短暂
summary_en: The author reflects on the brevity of life, particularly through the lens of parenthood. By quantifying time into discrete moments with children, the realization of life's shortness becomes tangible. The essay argues that acknowledging this brevity empowers us to eliminate 'bullshit'—time-wasting activities and meaningless interactions—both those imposed by external circumstances and those we choose. The author suggests actively seeking meaningful experiences and savoring them, emphasizing the importance of not postponing what truly matters. The piece is a poignant reminder to live intentionally and prioritize what brings genuine value to our lives.
summary_zh: 作者通过育儿体验，深刻感受到生命的短暂。将时间转化为具体的瞬间，让人更真切地认识到生命的有限。文章认为，意识到这一点能帮助我们摒弃无意义的琐事，无论是外界强加的还是自己选择的。建议主动追求有意义的经历并珍惜它们，强调不拖延重要的事情。这篇文章是对生活的深刻反思，提醒我们活得更有意识，优先选择真正有价值的事物。
best_quote_en: Life is short, as everyone knows. When I was a kid I used to wonder about this. Is life actually short, or are we really complaining about its finiteness?
best_quote_zh: 生命短暂，众所周知。当我还是孩子时，常常思考这个问题。生命是真的短暂，还是我们在抱怨它的有限性？

title: Why Is the Drug Kingpin Daniel Kinahan Living Large in Dubai?
title_zh: 丹尼尔·基纳汉：一个毒枭如何在迪拜逍遥法外？
summary_en: This investigative piece delves into the life of Daniel Kinahan, an Irish drug lord who has built a billion-dollar empire while living openly in Dubai. The article explores his criminal career, from his early days in Dublin's drug trade to his current status as a key figure in Europe's cocaine trafficking network. The Kinahan Organized Crime Group, which he heads, has been linked to major drug trafficking operations and money laundering schemes across Europe and beyond. Despite international sanctions and law enforcement efforts, Kinahan remains at large in Dubai, where he enjoys a luxurious lifestyle and even dabbles in boxing management. The article highlights the complexities of international law enforcement, the challenges of extradition, and the role of Dubai as a haven for criminals. It also raises questions about the motivations of individuals like Kinahan, who continue to engage in high-risk criminal activities despite their wealth and apparent security.
summary_zh: 这篇调查报告深入探讨了丹尼尔·基纳汉的生活，他作为一名爱尔兰毒枭，在迪拜过着奢华的生活，同时经营着一个价值数十亿美元的毒品帝国。文章追溯了他的犯罪生涯，从在都柏林贩毒的早期经历到现在成为欧洲可卡因走私网络的关键人物。他领导的基纳汉犯罪集团与欧洲和其他地区的重大毒品走私和洗钱活动有关。尽管受到国际制裁和执法部门的追捕，基纳汉仍然在迪拜逍遥法外，享受奢华生活，甚至涉足拳击经纪。这篇文章揭示了国际执法的复杂性，引渡的挑战，以及迪拜作为犯罪避风港的作用。它还提出了关于像基纳汉这样的个人动机的问题，他们尽管已经富可敌国，仍然继续从事高风险的犯罪活动。
best_quote_en: He was a little uncoöperative... Not a nice person at all.
best_quote_zh: 他不太配合... 绝对不是一个好人。

title: Dehydrators
title_zh: 脱水机
summary_en: This article explores the practical applications and comparative advantages of food dehydrators, focusing on two popular models: the affordable Nesco and the high-capacity Excalibur. The Nesco is praised for its cost-effectiveness and efficient top-down heating system, making it ideal for occasional use or small batches. In contrast, the Excalibur offers superior capacity and uniformity for heavy users, though at a higher price point. The piece also highlights the benefits of bulk freeze-dried foods for outdoor enthusiasts, emphasizing cost savings and menu flexibility. The analysis underscores the value of dehydrators in food preservation, health-conscious snacking, and outdoor adventure planning, while offering insights into the trade-offs between budget and performance.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了食品脱水机的实用性及两款热门型号——性价比高的Nesco和大容量的Excalibur的比较优势。Nesco因其价格亲民和高效的顶部加热系统，适合偶尔使用或小批量处理。而Excalibur则因其更大的容量和均匀性能，更适合重度用户，尽管价格较高。文章还强调了散装冷冻干燥食品对户外爱好者的好处，突出了成本节约和菜单灵活性。分析指出，脱水机在食品保存、健康零食和户外冒险规划方面具有重要价值，并提供了预算与性能之间的权衡见解。
best_quote_en: The Nesco, when compared with the Excalibur, has the benefit of being nearly $125 dollars cheaper combined with a smaller (though expandable) footprint, a relatively-quiet fan, and similarly adjustable temperature.
best_quote_zh: 与Excalibur相比，Nesco的优势在于价格几乎便宜了125美元，同时拥有更小的占地面积（尽管可扩展）、相对安静的风扇和类似的温度可调性。

title: What I Wish Someone Had Told Me
title_zh: What I Wish Someone Had Told Me
summary_en: This article distills 17 hard-earned lessons from startup leadership, offering a mix of practical advice and profound insights about building and scaling successful ventures. The author emphasizes the importance of long-term thinking, audacious goals, and fighting bureaucracy to achieve meaningful outcomes. Key themes include the power of incentives, the value of superstar team members, and the necessity of fast iteration. The advice transcends typical startup guidance, touching on universal principles of leadership and organizational behavior that could benefit any ambitious team. The most striking insight is the emphasis on compounding advantages and the perishable nature of inspiration, which serves as a call to action for readers to pursue their goals with urgency and persistence.
summary_zh: 这篇文章总结了17条创业领导力的经验教训，兼具实用建议与深刻洞察。作者强调长期思维、大胆目标和打破官僚主义的重要性。核心主题包括激励力量、超级明星员工的价值以及快速迭代的必要性。这些建议超越了常规的创业指导，触及领导力与组织行为的普世原则。最引人深思的是关于复利优势和灵感易逝的观点，这对读者而言是一种行动号召，激励他们以紧迫感和毅力追求目标。
best_quote_en: It is easier for a team to do a hard thing that really matters than to do an easy thing that doesn’t really matter; audacious ideas motivate people.
best_quote_zh: 团队做一件真正重要的难事比做一件无关紧要的容易事更简单；大胆的想法能激励人们。

title: We were on the brink of a big bush revival - then Kim K released her pubic hair thong | Coco Khan
title_zh: 我们正处于一场大规模毛发复兴的边缘——然后金·卡戴珊发布了她的阴毛丁字裤 | 科科·卡恩
summary_en: Coco Khan's piece offers a sharp critique of the beauty industry's commodification of natural body features, using Kim Kardashian's faux pubic hair thong as a case study. The article explores the tension between the burgeoning body positivity movement and the industry's relentless profit motives. Khan argues that while we may be witnessing a potential revival of natural pubic hair, products like Skims' thong actually perpetuate the same problematic beauty standards they claim to challenge. The piece highlights how celebrity influence, particularly Kardashian's, shapes global beauty norms and questions whether genuine body acceptance is possible within our current capitalist framework. It's a thought-provoking examination of how natural body features become yet another commodity in the beauty industry's endless pursuit of profit.
summary_zh: 科科·卡恩的文章尖锐批判了美容行业如何将自然身体特征商品化，以金·卡戴珊的假阴毛丁字裤为例。文章探讨了身体正念运动与行业利益之间的张力。卡恩认为，尽管我们可能正见证自然阴毛的复兴，但斯金斯的产品实际上延续了相同的有问题的审美标准。文章凸显了名人影响力如何塑造全球审美规范，并质疑在资本主义框架内是否可能实现真正的身体接受。这是对自然身体特征如何成为美容行业无休止的盈利追求中又一商品的深刻思考。
best_quote_en: The beauty industry has mastered selling us back an ersatz version of our own nature for enormous profit.
best_quote_zh: 美容行业已经掌握了以巨额利润将我们自己的天然本性以仿制品形式卖回给我们的技巧。

title: Economic Inequality
title_zh: 经济不平等
summary_en: This essay challenges conventional wisdom about economic inequality by dissecting its multiple causes and questioning simplistic solutions. The author, a startup founder, argues that while some aspects of inequality stem from harmful practices like tax loopholes, others arise from wealth creation through innovation and entrepreneurship. The piece critiques the tendency to treat inequality as a monolithic issue, highlighting that startup founders' success contributes to inequality but also drives technological progress. It warns against policies that would stifle innovation by preventing wealth creation, suggesting instead that society should focus on addressing root causes of poverty and lack of social mobility rather than inequality itself.
summary_zh: 这篇文章挑战了关于经济不平等的传统观点，分析其多重成因并质疑简单的解决方案。作者作为创业者，认为不平等的部分源于有害行为如税收漏洞，部分源于创新和创业创造的财富。文章批评将不平等视为单一现象的倾向，指出创业成功者的财富增长虽然加剧了不平等，但也推动了技术进步。它警告说，阻碍创业的政策可能扼杀创新，建议社会应关注解决贫困和社会流动性问题的根源，而非直接针对不平等本身。
best_quote_en: The most common mistake people make about economic inequality is to treat it as a single phenomenon.
best_quote_zh: 关于经济不平等最常见的错误是将其视为单一现象。

title: The Real Target of Trump’s War on Drug Boats
title_zh: 特朗普打击毒品船只的真正目标
summary_en: This article delves into the Trump administration's recent military actions against suspected drug traffickers in the Caribbean, raising serious questions about the true motivations behind these strikes. While justified as counter-narcotics operations, the evidence suggests these actions are more about political posturing and domestic messaging than effective drug interdiction. The piece highlights the lack of concrete evidence linking the targeted vessels to significant drug trafficking, the political motivations in Florida's Venezuelan community, and the dangerous escalation of military action in the region. The analysis also reveals internal administration conflicts over Venezuela policy, with hardliners like Marco Rubio and Stephen Miller pushing for aggressive actions. The broader implications for U.S. relations with Latin America and the potential for wider conflict are deeply concerning, as these actions could set dangerous precedents for executive power and military intervention.
summary_zh: 这篇文章揭露了特朗普政府近期在加勒比海对所谓毒品走私船只的军事行动背后的真实动机。虽然被宣称为缉毒行动，证据显示这些行为更多是政治表演和国内宣传。文中指出，针对的船只与大规模毒品走私的关联证据薄弱，而佛罗里达州的委内瑞拉社区政治因素在其中扮演重要角色。分析还揭示了政府内部关于委内瑞拉政策的激烈争论，鲁比奥和米勒等强硬派推动激进行动。这些军事行动对美洲国家关系和区域稳定的更广泛影响令人担忧，可能为行政权力扩张和军事干预树立危险先例。
best_quote_en: This is basically U.S. propaganda through force. This is not a counter-narcotics mission. It's using a ten-ton truck to kill an ant.
best_quote_zh: 这实际上是通过武力进行的美国宣传。这不是反毒行动。这就像用十吨重的卡车去杀一只蚂蚁。

title: A Wild Swan / The Creative Cottage
title_zh: 野天鹅与创意小屋：重新诠释经典与生活美学
summary_en: This analysis presents two distinct works that reimagine traditional concepts through creative lenses. A Wild Swan offers a literary exploration of fairy tales with modern, often subversive perspectives. Michael Cunningham's reworking of classic stories through different viewpoints and narrative techniques challenges conventional happy endings, offering instead nuanced, sometimes darker reflections on human nature. The collaboration with Yuko Shimizu's exquisite illustrations elevates the work to an art object, blending contemporary storytelling with timeless visual aesthetics. Meanwhile, The Creative Cottage transforms the idea of small-space living into an art form. The book showcases 13 uniquely rehabilitated cottages, each a testament to creative vision and resourcefulness. The detailed descriptions of upcycled and repurposed elements invite readers to see everyday objects in new ways, inspiring creativity in personal living spaces. Both works demonstrate how established forms can be revitalized through innovative approaches, offering valuable insights for writers, designers, and anyone seeking inspiration in reinvention.
summary_zh: 这两部作品以不同方式重新诠释了经典与生活美学。《野天鹅》通过现代视角解构童话故事，迈克尔·坎宁安用独特叙事颠覆传统结局，揭示人性复杂面。与石泽夕子的精美插画结合，使作品兼具文学与艺术价值。而《创意小屋》则将小空间改造升华为艺术，展示了13座充满创意的小屋，每一处回收利用的元素都体现着主人的独特视野。两部作品均证明创新能赋予传统形式新生命，为作家、设计师及追求创新者提供宝贵启发。
best_quote_en: 'End of story. 'Happily ever after' fell on everyone like a guillotine's blade.'
best_quote_zh: 故事结束。'从此快乐地生活在一起'像断头台的刀刃般砍向所有人。

title: Helion Needs You
title_zh: Helion 需要你
summary_en: Helion's rapid progress in fusion energy represents a potential paradigm shift in global power generation. The company's ambitious goals—achieving Q > 1 fusion and designing mass-producible generators by 2024—could revolutionize the energy landscape with clean, ultra-low-cost electricity. The implications are profound: 1 cent per kilowatt-hour energy could transform industries, elevate global living standards, and enable scalable carbon capture. However, Helion now faces critical engineering and operational challenges that demand exceptional talent. The article highlights the pivotal role of skilled professionals in scaling this technology, emphasizing that the company's success hinges on attracting top engineers and managers to tackle complex manufacturing, infrastructure, and global deployment challenges.
summary_zh: Helion在核聚变能源领域的快速进展可能将彻底改变全球能源格局。该公司在2024年实现Q>1聚变和设计可批量生产的发电机的目标极具挑战性，但一旦成功，将带来清洁、超低成本的电力。这一突破可能重塑产业格局，提升全球生活水平，并实现大规模碳捕获。然而，Helion目前面临着关键的工程和运营挑战，需要顶尖人才。文章强调，吸引优秀的工程师和管理者解决复杂的制造、基础设施和全球部署问题，将是公司成功的关键。
best_quote_en: Abundant, clean, and radically inexpensive energy will elevate the quality of life for all of us
best_quote_zh: 丰富、清洁且极其低廉的能源将提升我们所有人的生活质量

title: It’s great to see pregnant women in the public eye – but must they all be so gorgeous? | Coco Khan
title_zh: 看到公众视野中的孕妇很棒——但她们必须都这么美吗？| 科科·卡汉
summary_en: Coco Khan critiques the fashion industry's portrayal of pregnancy, questioning why only glamorous, thin models like Victoria's Secret's Jasmine Tookes are showcased. She argues that while representation matters, the industry often perpetuates unrealistic beauty standards by only featuring 'hot mums' with picture-perfect pregnancies. Khan reflects on the physical and mental transformations of pregnancy, suggesting more authentic portrayals could benefit women's body image. The piece blends personal experience with cultural commentary, challenging brands' empowerment messaging while acknowledging the complexity of media representation.
summary_zh: 科科·卡汉批评时尚行业对孕妇形象的塑造，质疑为何只有像维多利亚的秘密模特贾斯汀·图克斯这样的完美女性才能被展示。她认为虽然代表性重要，但行业往往通过只展示
best_quote_en: I’d have hoped that by now we would have learned that we need more than just images of hot mums – glamorous, rich, thin women whose pregnancies appear to be just convenient little bumps.
best_quote_zh: 我本希望我们已经明白，现在需要的不仅仅是漂亮妈妈的形象——那些光鲜、富有、苗条的女性，她们的孕期看起来只是方便的小肚子。

title: The Refragmentation
title_zh: 重新碎片化
summary_en: This essay explores the phenomenon of societal and economic fragmentation, arguing that the mid-20th century's cohesion was an anomaly driven by World War II and the rise of large corporations. The author suggests that the current trend toward fragmentation is a return to normalcy, driven by the erosion of these historical forces. The analysis delves into how war and corporate structures created economic and social uniformity, and how their decline has led to increased polarization, cultural divergence, and economic inequality. The author warns against attempting to recreate mid-century cohesion, as it was a product of unique historical circumstances. Instead, they advocate for addressing the consequences of fragmentation rather than trying to reverse it.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了社会和经济碎片化的现象，认为中世纪的凝聚力是由二战和大型企业的崛起所驱动的异常现象。作者认为，当前的碎片化趋势是回归常态，是由这些历史力量的消退所驱动的。分析深入探讨了战争和企业结构如何创造了经济和社会的统一性，以及它们的衰落如何导致了日益严重的两极分化、文化差异和经济不平等。作者警告不要尝试重现中世纪的凝聚力，因为它是独特的历史环境的产物。相反，他们主张解决碎片化的后果，而不是试图逆转它。
best_quote_en: The day of combination is here to stay. Individualism has gone, never to return.
best_quote_zh: 组合的时代已经到来，个体主义一去不复返。

title: A New Paradigm for Protecting Homes from Disastrous Fires
title_zh: 保护家园免受灾难性火灾的新范式
summary_en: This article explores the complex science behind wildland-urban interface fires and challenges conventional wisdom about fire protection. The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) has identified over 50 ways homes can ignite, requiring comprehensive hardening measures. The article reveals that firefighter actions often save homes more than construction choices, and embers from distant fires can be more dangerous than advancing flames. The piece highlights the limitations of current building codes and the need for community-wide fire prevention efforts. It presents both the daunting reality of complete retrofitting and the practical challenges homeowners face in implementing these measures, offering a nuanced look at the future of fire prevention strategies.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了野地-城市交界处火灾的复杂科学，挑战了关于火灾防护的传统观念。国家标准与技术研究院（NIST）识别出了超过50种房屋起火的方式，需要全面的加固措施。文章揭示，消防员的行动往往比建筑选择更能拯救房屋，远处火灾的火星可能比推进的火墙更危险。它突显了现行建筑法规的局限性以及需要社区共同努力的火灾预防。文章同时呈现了全面翻新的沉重现实和业主在实施这些措施时面临的实际挑战，为火灾预防战略的未来提供了深刻的洞察。
best_quote_en: Fire doesn’t care about who owns what.
best_quote_zh: 火灾不关心谁拥有什么。

title: What’s in my NOW? — Aishwarya Goel
title_zh: 我的现在是什么？ — 艾什瓦里娅·戈伊尔
summary_en: Aishwarya Goel shares her curated selection of essential tools that enhance her daily life, offering a glimpse into the practical innovations that shape her routine. From the Philips Signe Gradient Floor Lamp that adapts to her mood to the DASH Mini Maker Electric Griddle that revolutionizes her breakfast routine, these physical tools demonstrate how thoughtful design can elevate everyday experiences. Her digital tools, like MyNetDiary for health tracking and Bear Blog for writing, highlight the power of intuitive interfaces in maintaining consistency. The quote from James Dyson about excellence as the capacity to take pain adds a philosophical dimension, suggesting that her curated selections are not just about convenience but also about personal growth and resilience.
summary_zh: 艾什瓦里娅·戈伊尔分享了她日常生活中不可或缺的工具精选，展示了如何通过精心设计的创新提升日常体验。从能够根据情绪调节的飞利浦Signe渐变地灯，到改变早餐习惯的DASH迷你电圆形烤盘，这些物理工具展示了良好设计如何提升日常生活。她的数字工具，如用于健康追踪的MyNetDiary和用于写作的Bear Blog，凸显了直观界面在维持持续性方面的重要性。詹姆斯·戴森关于卓越是忍受痛苦能力的引用，为她的精选工具增添了哲学维度，暗示这些选择不仅仅是为了方便，更是为了个人成长和韧性。
best_quote_en: Excellence is the capacity to take pain.
best_quote_zh: 卓越是忍受痛苦的能力。

title: DALL•E 2
title_zh: DALL•E 2
summary_en: The introduction of DALL•E 2 marks a significant milestone in AI-driven creativity tools. Beyond its impressive technical capabilities, the tool represents a shift towards natural language interfaces that could redefine human-computer interaction. The author's enthusiasm for its creativity-enhancing potential is balanced by thoughtful consideration of its societal impact, including potential job market disruptions and ethical implications. The research launch approach demonstrates a responsible strategy for deploying powerful AI technologies. This tool not only showcases AI's ability to understand and generate complex creative outputs but also challenges conventional wisdom about the progression of AI capabilities.
summary_zh: DALL•E 2的推出标志着AI驱动的创意工具的重要里程碑。除了其令人印象深刻的技术能力，该工具代表了向自然语言界面的转变，这可能重新定义人机交互。作者对其创造力增强潜力的热情与对其社会影响的深刻思考相平衡，包括潜在的就业市场变化和伦理问题。研究发布的方式展示了部署强大AI技术的负责任策略。该工具不仅展示了AI理解和生成复杂创意输出的能力，还挑战了关于AI能力进展的传统智慧。
best_quote_en: It’s a reminder that predictions about AI are very difficult to make. A decade ago, the conventional wisdom was that AI would first impact physical labor, and then cognitive labor, and then maybe someday it could do creative work. It now looks like it’s going to go in the opposite order.
best_quote_zh: 这提醒我们，关于AI的预测非常困难。十年前的常识是，AI首先会影响体力劳动，然后是认知劳动，也许有一天才能进行创造性工作。现在看来，它可能会以相反的顺序发展。

title: UK women in tech: we would like to hear from you
title_zh: 英国女性在科技领域：我们想听取您的意见
summary_en: The Lovelace Report 2025, in collaboration with WeAreTechWomen, reveals alarming statistics about women leaving the UK tech sector, costing the economy billions annually. With only 20% of tech workers being women, the report identifies key reasons for attrition including lack of career advancement, inadequate recognition, and pay inequity. This analysis highlights systemic issues in tech industry culture and calls for action to retain and advance women in technology. The Guardian's initiative to collect personal experiences aims to humanize these statistics and drive meaningful change.
summary_zh: 洛夫莱斯报告2025与WeAreTechWomen合作，揭示英国科技行业女性流失情况严峻，每年造成数十亿英镑经济损失。仅20%的科技从业者是女性，报告指出职业发展受阻、认可不足和薪酬不平等是主要原因。这一分析揭示了科技行业文化中的深层问题，呼吁采取行动留住并提升女性。卫报收集个人经历的倡议，旨在为这些数据注入人性化视角，推动实质性变革。
best_quote_en: An estimated £1.4 billion to £2.2 billion is lost every year from women leaving the industry
best_quote_zh: 每年有14亿至22亿英镑因女性离开行业而流失

title: Jessica Livingston
title_zh: 杰西卡·利文斯顿
summary_en: This piece reveals the often overlooked but pivotal role of Jessica Livingston in shaping Y Combinator (YC). While YC is often associated with its public-facing founder, the article argues that Jessica's unique qualities were instrumental in creating YC's distinctive culture and success. Her exceptional ability to judge character, dubbed the 'Social Radar,' was crucial in selecting founders who were not just promising but also good people, fostering a remarkable alumni network. The article explores how her aversion to attention and conflict, while sometimes working against her public recognition, actually contributed to YC's authenticity and values. It highlights the irony that her most significant contributions often go unnoticed, and calls for greater acknowledgment of her role in understanding and nurturing startup founders. This is a thoughtful examination of how personal qualities shape organizational culture and success.
summary_zh: 这篇文章揭示了杰西卡·利文斯顿在塑造Y Combinator（YC）过程中所发挥的关键作用。尽管YC常与其公开形象的创始人联系在一起，但文章指出杰西卡的独特品质才是构建YC独特文化和成功的核心。她的

title: Guys I might be an e/acc
title_zh: 也许我是一个e/acc
summary_en: This thought-provoking analysis challenges the consensus around AI pause arguments presented in 'If Anyone Builds It, Everyone Dies' (IABIED). The author, identifying as potentially an 'effective accelerationist' (e/acc), applies personal estimates to the AI timeline and probability of existential risk to question whether an AI pause is justified. Through detailed 'napkin math,' they calculate the trade-offs between immediate human lives lost during a pause versus the potential reduction in existential risk. The piece explores the author's values regarding the importance of humanity's long-term future, questioning whether preventing distant existential risks should take precedence over near-term human suffering. The analysis concludes with a personalized calculator to help others evaluate their stance based on their own values and assumptions, emphasizing the subjective nature of this complex ethical dilemma.
summary_zh: 这篇深刻的分析质疑了《如果任何人构建它，所有人都会死亡》（IABIED）中关于AI暂停的共识观点。作者可能是一个“有效加速主义者”（e/acc），通过应用个人对AI时间线和存在风险概率的估计，质疑AI暂停是否值得。通过详细的“草纸计算”，他们权衡了暂停期间人类立即死亡与潜在存在风险降低之间的权衡。文章探讨了作者对人类长期未来重要性的价值观，质疑是否应该优先于近期人类痛苦来预防遥远的存在风险。分析以一个个性化计算器结束，帮助他人根据自己的价值观和假设评估立场，强调了这一复杂伦理困境的主观性。
best_quote_en: If we pause AI, then based on my estimates, we’ll see an extra 200 million deaths, and the chances of humanity ceasing to exist is halved from 10% to 5%. Is that worth it? That depends on your values.
best_quote_zh: 根据我的估计，如果我们暂停AI，将会多出2亿人死亡，人类灭绝的几率从10%降至5%。这值得吗？这取决于你的价值观。

title: Andrew Cuomo’s Long Goodbye
title_zh: 安德鲁·库默的漫长告别
summary_en: This article offers a scathing critique of Andrew Cuomo's mayoral campaign, highlighting the hypocrisy of his experience argument against younger opponent Zohran Mamdani. Cuomo's career, marked by power consolidation and eventual downfall due to sexual harassment allegations, shows the dangers of unchecked political ambition. The piece reveals Cuomo's desperate tactics, including smears against Mamdani's views on Israel and attempts to co-opt his opponent's successful strategies. The analysis exposes Cuomo's political opportunism and the irony of his conservative backers blaming policies he himself implemented. The article serves as a cautionary tale about political relevance and the consequences of clinging to power beyond one's time.
summary_zh: 这篇文章尖锐批判了安德鲁·库默的市长竞选，揭露他以经验反击年轻对手马姆达尼的虚伪。库默的职业生涯从权力巩固到因性骚扰指控下台，警示了政治野心失控的危害。文中披露库默的绝望伎俩，包括对马姆达尼以色列观点的污蔑和试图效仿对手成功策略。分析揭示了库默的政治机会主义，以及保守派支持者指责他自己签署的政策的讽刺。这篇文章如同政治寓言，警示权力的滥用与过时的危害。
best_quote_en: The city has been getting screwed by the state. Who was leading the state?
best_quote_zh: 城市一直被州政府坑害。是谁在领导州政府？

title: Digital Entry Europe/Text Scammers/Mumbai’s 2nd Airport
title_zh: 数字入境欧洲/文本诈骗/孟买的第二座机场
summary_en: This week's newsletter offers a mix of practical travel updates and intriguing global insights. The introduction of Europe's new Entry and Exit System (EES) promises faster immigration but raises privacy concerns about movement tracking. The deep dive into 'pig butchering' scams reveals the alarming scale of digital financial fraud, with the US DOJ's $15 billion Bitcoin seizure highlighting the urgency of cybersecurity awareness. Mumbai's new airport marks a significant infrastructure milestone, while Time Out's coolest neighborhoods list serves as a cultural treasure trove for digital nomads. The content balances actionable travel advice with thought-provoking global perspectives, demonstrating the author's expertise in both practical travel and global trends.
summary_zh: 本周通讯结合了实用的旅行更新和引人深思的全球洞察。欧洲新入境与出境系统（EES）的推出虽然可能加快通关速度，但也引发了关于个人隐私的担忧。关于“杀猪盘”诈骗的深度分析揭示了数字金融诈骗的惊人规模，美国司法部没收150亿美元比特币的事件凸显了网络安全意识的紧迫性。孟买新机场的开通标志着重要的基础设施里程碑，而Time Out的“全球最酷街区”榜单为数字游民提供了文化宝藏。内容平衡了实用旅行建议和全球趋势的深刻见解，展现了作者在实用旅行和全球趋势方面的专业知识。
best_quote_en: It's a good list for nomads looking to find the local vibe since the purpose is to highlight 'places that represent the soul of our cities, while maintaining their own unique local character that draws people in to live, work and play.'
best_quote_zh: 这是一个适合游牧者寻找当地氛围的好清单，因为它的目的就是突出“代表我们城市灵魂的地方，同时保持其独特的地方特色，吸引人们来这里生活、工作和娱乐。”

title: ‘Every time I step outside, the first thing on my mind is my forehead’: the women getting hair transplants
title_zh: 每次出门，我首先想到的就是我的前额：接受头发移植的女性
summary_en: This article explores the growing trend of women undergoing hair transplants, a procedure once primarily associated with men. It delves into the psychological and societal pressures that drive women to seek this solution, highlighting the unique challenges they face due to differing patterns of hair loss and societal beauty standards. The piece also examines the risks and ethical concerns surrounding the procedure, including the prevalence of botched jobs and the lack of regulation in the industry. It's a thought-provoking look at how beauty standards and the quest for perfection can impact mental health and self-perception, particularly among women.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了越来越多女性选择接受头发移植手术的现象，这一手术曾主要面向男性。它深入分析了推动女性寻求这一解决方案的心理和社会压力，突出了她们因不同的脱发模式和社会美容标准面临的独特挑战。该文还检视了该手术的风险和伦理问题，包括劣质手术的普遍性和行业监管缺失。这是一篇发人深省的文章，揭示了美容标准和完美追求如何影响心理健康和自我认知，尤其是对女性而言。
best_quote_en: It's just societal pressure. Where once we were obsessed with straight teeth, now it’s the perfect hairline.
best_quote_zh: 这只是社会压力。我们曾经痴迷于牙齿整齐，现在则是完美的发际线。

title: A Way to Detect Bias
title_zh: A Way to Detect Bias
summary_en: This article presents a fascinating methodology for detecting bias in selection processes without knowing details about the applicant pool. The core insight is that bias can be identified when certain groups must perform better to be selected, leading to higher performance among selected members of that group. The author illustrates this with venture capital data showing female-founded startups outperforming others, suggesting the VC selection process may be biased. This technique's power lies in its objectivity and potential to uncover hidden biases across various domains where performance metrics exist. The author predicts increased use of this method as data availability grows, offering a powerful tool for analyzing and improving fairness in selection processes.
summary_zh: 这篇文章介绍了一种检测选择过程中的偏见的方法，无需了解申请者池的具体信息。核心观点是，如果某些群体需要更优秀才能被选中，那么该群体中被选中的成员表现会更好。作者以风投数据为例，显示女性创办的初创公司表现优于其他公司，暗示风投的选择过程可能存在偏见。该方法的价值在于其客观性和在各种有性能指标的领域中揭示隐藏偏见的潜力。作者预测，随着数据可用性的增加，这种方法将被更广泛使用，为分析和改善选择过程的公平性提供强大工具。
best_quote_en: This is not just a heuristic for detecting bias. It's what bias means.
best_quote_zh: 这不仅仅是一种检测偏见的启发式方法。这是偏见的本质。

title: Musings on Reported Cost of Compute (Oct 2025)
title_zh: 关于报告的计算成本思考（2025年10月）
summary_en: This analysis provides a detailed breakdown of the complex economics behind AI compute infrastructure, revealing how costs can be reported in vastly different ways depending on perspective. The author examines capital expenditures (capex) for infrastructure and hardware, operational expenses, and contract structures, highlighting how a $300bn contract might actually represent just 5 GW of capacity. The piece challenges common assumptions about Nvidia's dominance in GPU costs, suggesting non-Nvidia hardware might not be significantly cheaper. Looking ahead to 2026, the analysis predicts substantial increases in both compute capacity and model sizes, with implications for Mixture of Experts (MoE) models and computational efficiency. The author's deep dive into these financial and technical considerations offers valuable insights for anyone navigating the economics of AI infrastructure.
summary_zh: 这篇分析详细拆解了AI计算基础设施背后的复杂经济学，揭示了成本报告方式的多样性。作者探讨了基础设施和硬件的资本支出、运营费用和合同结构，指出3000亿美元的合同可能仅代表5 GW的容量。文章挑战了关于英伟达GPU成本主导地位的常见假设，认为非英伟达硬件可能并不便宜很多。展望2026年，分析预测计算容量和模型规模将大幅增加，对混合专家（MoE）模型和计算效率有深远影响。作者对这些财务和技术考量的深度分析，为任何涉足AI基础设施经济的人士提供了宝贵见解。
best_quote_en: Thus a $300bn contract might mean about 5 GW of total capacity, while a $27bn datacenter site could simultaneously mean 2 GW of total capacity.
best_quote_zh: 因此，3000亿美元的合同可能意味着大约5 GW的总容量，而270亿美元的数据中心站点同时可能意味着2 GW的总容量。

title: Tales from Toddlerhood
title_zh: 幼儿期的趣事
summary_en: This humorous and insightful piece explores the paradoxes of toddler parenting with sharp observations and self-deprecating wit. The author shares eight revelations about toddler behavior that range from endearing to exasperating, capturing the unique challenges and joys of this developmental stage. With illustrations that enhance the comedic effect, the article offers a relatable look at the absurdities of toddler logic, the intensity of their personalities, and the universal experience of parenting judgment. It's a refreshing mix of personal anecdotes and universal truths that will resonate with any parent who's navigated the toddler years.
summary_zh: 文章以幽默的笔触探讨了育儿过程中幼儿期的各种悖论，作者通过八个发现揭示了幼儿行为的矛盾之处。从孩子既令人着迷又让人无聊的矛盾性，到幼儿独特的世界观，再到育儿观念的多样性，内容既真实又充满智慧。这种亲子互动的独特体验，让每个经历过幼儿期的家长都能深有体会。
best_quote_en: If you’re walking down the street and an elephant flies down from the sky, hovers ten feet above you and says hello in a silly cartoon voice before flying off, would you be like 'OH MY GOD WHAT JUST HAPPENED' or would you shrug and be like 'I guess that’s something that happens'?
best_quote_zh: 如果你走在街上，突然有只大象从天而降，悬停在你十英尺上方用滑稽的卡通声音向你打招呼后飞走，你会像‘哦我的天发生了什么’还是会耸耸肩说‘算了，这应该是正常的吧’？

title: Retro Recomendo: Science
title_zh: Retro Recomendo: 科学
summary_en: This 'Retro Recomendo' issue is a clever revival of past recommendations, focusing on science. It highlights evergreen resources that remain valuable years after their initial publication. The selections span from visual explanations of cutting-edge research to classic science education books, showing how different mediums can make complex topics accessible. What's particularly noteworthy is the blend of modern digital tools (like the 4D app) with timeless print resources, demonstrating that great educational content transcends format. The inclusion of NASA's citizen science projects also underscues the democratization of science, making it participatory rather than just observational. This issue exemplifies how quality science communication can bridge generations and engage diverse audiences.
summary_zh: 这期“Retro Recomendo”精选了过去九年最有价值的科学推荐内容，展示了优质教育资源的经典魅力。从视觉化的前沿研究到经典科学教育书籍，再到NASA的公民科学项目，这些资源跨越了数字和印刷格式，证明了优质科学传播的持久价值。值得关注的是，这些推荐不仅让复杂概念变得易于理解，还鼓励读者参与科学探索，展现了科学传播的多样性与包容性。
best_quote_en: Doug is a regular-guy geologist who draws his own graphics with pencil, and carries his own camera as he trudges across the landscape, giving the big picture of what has happened to shape the land, and how that shapes the culture on it.
best_quote_zh: 道格是一个普通的地质学家，他用铅笔自己画图，带着自己的相机跋涉在土地上，向我们展示了塑造这片土地的历史，以及它如何影响这里的文化。

title: Write Like You Talk
title_zh: 像说话一样写作
summary_en: This insightful piece argues for writing in conversational language to improve readability and engagement. The author critiques formal, complex writing styles that create unnecessary barriers between writer and reader. Through vivid examples, he demonstrates how informal language makes complex ideas more accessible. The article offers practical advice: write your first draft normally, then edit to match spoken language, or even explain your ideas to a friend and rewrite using that conversation. This approach not only makes writing more engaging but also helps writers avoid the illusion of depth created by complex syntax. The piece challenges the notion that formal writing is inherently better, suggesting instead that clarity and connection should be the primary goals.
summary_zh: 这篇文章提出了一个简单却有效的写作建议：用说话的方式写作。作者批评了正式、复杂的写作风格，认为它们制造了作者与读者之间的障碍。通过生动的例子，他展示了非正式语言如何使复杂的思想更易于理解。文章提供了实际建议：先写初稿，然后修改成对话式语言，或者向朋友解释你的想法，用那次对话重写。这种方法不仅使写作更具吸引力，还能帮助作者避免因复杂句式而产生的虚假深度。文章挑战了正式写作高于一切的观念，建议以清晰和联系为主要目标。
best_quote_en: Informal language is the athletic clothing of ideas.
best_quote_zh: 非正式语言是思想的运动服装。

title: Seven-ish Words from My Thought-Language
title_zh: 七个从未存在的词语
summary_en: This article presents a fascinating exploration of seven invented words that capture nuanced human experiences not easily expressed in English. The author highlights the semantic limitations of English and draws parallels with words from other languages like Korean and Lojban. Each word is meticulously defined with examples and cultural context, revealing universal human experiences that transcend linguistic barriers. The piece serves as both a linguistic curiosity and a thought-provoking reflection on communication, offering expert insight into cognitive psychology and philosophy of mind. It's a blend of creative linguistic exploration and deep intellectual engagement, inviting readers to reconsider how language shapes our perception of the world.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了七个从未存在却应该存在的词语，揭示了英语表达上的局限性。作者以精妙的定义和生动的例子，展现了这些词语如何捕捉人类复杂的心理状态。从语言学角度看，这是一次创新的尝试；从哲学角度看，它揭示了语言与认知之间的深刻联系。这些词语不仅丰富了我们的表达工具，也提供了独特的视角来理解人类思维的复杂性。
best_quote_en: To be tongue-tied not out of a lack of things to say, but out of an overabundance of mutually exclusive things to say, all of equal priority
best_quote_zh: 语塞不是因为无话可说，而是因为有太多互斥的想法，每个都同样重要

title: What if the Big Law Firms Hadn’t Caved to Trump?
title_zh: 如果大型律师事务所没有向特朗普妥协会怎样？
summary_en: This article explores a critical counterfactual: what if major U.S. law firms had resisted Trump's executive orders rather than quickly capitulating? The piece draws a powerful parallel to Marlon Brando's famous speech in 'On the Waterfront,' highlighting how the failure to protect institutions we owe a duty to has enabled Trump's erosion of legal norms. The author argues that law firms, which play a crucial role in upholding the legal system, had a unique responsibility to resist. Instead, firms like Paul, Weiss settled quickly, providing pro-bono services to the administration in exchange for lifting restrictions. This capitulation sent a signal to other firms and emboldened Trump's assault on the rule of law. The piece suggests that collective action among law firms could have provided momentum to defend legal principles.
summary_zh: 文章探讨了一个关键反事实问题：如果大型美国律师事务所没有迅速向特朗普的行政命令妥协，结果会怎样？作者将特朗普对法律体系的侵蚀与《码头风云》中马龙·白兰度的经典台词相类比，强调律师事务所未能保护其所欠的制度责任。文章指出，律师事务所在维护法律体系方面负有特殊责任，但像Paul, Weiss这样的大型事务所却迅速妥协，用法律援助服务换取行政命令的解除。这种妥协向其他事务所发出了信号，助长了特朗普对法治的侵蚀。作者认为，律师事务所的集体行动本可以为捍卫法律原则提供动力。
best_quote_en: "It wasn’t him, Charlie. It was you. You was my brother, Charlie. You should’ve looked out for me a little bit. You should’ve taken care of me just a little bit, so I wouldn’t have to take them dives for the short-end money."
best_quote_zh: "这不是他的错，查理。是你。你是我哥哥啊，查理。你本该多照顾我一点。你本该多关心我一点，这样我就不用为了那点小钱去作假了。"

title: Helion
title_zh: Helion
summary_en: The investment in Helion represents a significant bet on fusion energy as a transformative technology. What makes Helion particularly compelling is its startup-like efficiency and the impressive technical achievements of its founders, David and Chris. They've built a working electricity generator with minimal funding compared to other fusion projects, targeting net electricity production by 2024 and an ambitious goal of 1 cent per kilowatt-hour. The potential implications are profound: abundant, cheap energy could revolutionize our approach to climate change by enabling large-scale carbon capture and dramatically improving quality of life through reduced energy costs. This investment isn't just about energy—it's about reimagining our economic and environmental future.
summary_zh: 投资Helion是对核聚变能源作为变革性技术的重大押注。Helion最引人注目之处在于其创业公司般的高效运作和创始人David和Chris的卓越技术成就。他们以远低于其他聚变项目的资金，打造出了能够发电的设备，并计划在2024年实现净电力输出，目标是将每千瓦时电力成本降至1美分。其潜在影响深远：充足且低廉的能源可能通过大规模碳捕捉彻底改变应对气候变化的方式，并通过降低能源成本显著提升生活质量。这一投资不仅关乎能源，更是对经济与环境未来的重新想象。
best_quote_en: Helion has a clear path to net electricity by 2024, and has a long-term goal of delivering electricity for 1 cent per kilowatt-hour.
best_quote_zh: Helion将在2024年实现净电力输出，并致力于将电力成本降至每千瓦时1美分。

title: Essentials: The Science of Gratitude & How to Build a Gratitude Practice
title_zh: 本质：感恩的科学及如何建立感恩实践
summary_en: This Huberman Lab Essentials episode dives deep into the neuroscience of gratitude, revealing why traditional practices like listing things we're grateful for often fall short. The podcast highlights how story-based gratitude practices activate specific brain regions, fostering calm, social connection, and motivation while reducing anxiety and inflammation. Dr. Huberman emphasizes that genuine gratitude can't be forced, presenting a practical weekly gratitude practice that positively impacts both mental and physical well-being. The episode bridges scientific research with actionable advice, making complex neuroscience accessible while offering tangible benefits for listeners.
summary_zh: 这个Huberman Lab Essentials节目深入探讨了感恩的神经科学，揭示了传统感恩练习如列出感恩事项为何效果有限。节目强调故事式感恩实践能激活特定大脑区域，增强平静、社交连接和动机，同时减少焦虑和炎症。Huberman博士指出真诚的感恩无法强迫，提供了一个实用的每周感恩练习，对心理和身体健康均有积极影响。该节目将科学研究与可操作建议相结合，使复杂的神经科学知识变得易于理解，同时为听众带来实际收益。
best_quote_en: Being grateful activates specific brain regions, which enhance calm, social connection and motivation, while reducing anxiety and inflammation.
best_quote_zh: 感恩能激活特定大脑区域，增强平静、社交连接和动机，同时减少焦虑和炎症。

title: Default Alive or Default Dead?
title_zh: Default Alive or Default Dead？
summary_en: This insightful piece by Paul Graham delves into the critical but often overlooked question of whether startups are 'default alive' or 'default dead.' By examining the trajectory of a startup's finances, Graham highlights how many founders fail to ask this crucial question until it's too late, leading to the 'fatal pinch'—a situation where slow growth and insufficient runway combine to doom the company. The essay emphasizes the dangers of overhiring, a common pitfall that exacerbates financial woes rather than solving them. Graham advocates for founders to start asking this question early and to have a clear plan B, as relying solely on investor funding is perilous. The piece also underscores the importance of focusing on product-market fit over rapid scaling, using Airbnb's early days as a case study. Ultimately, Graham's analysis serves as a wake-up call for founders to prioritize sustainability and adaptability over reckless growth.
summary_zh: 保罗·格雷厄姆的这篇文章探讨了一个关键但常被忽视的问题：初创公司是“默认存活”还是“默认死亡”。通过分析初创公司的财务轨迹，他指出许多创始人直到为时已晚才意识到这个问题，导致陷入“致命挤压”——增长缓慢和资金不足的结合体。文章强调过度雇佣的危险，这是一个常见的陷阱，加剧了财务困境而非解决问题。格雷厄姆建议创始人应尽早提出这个问题，并制定明确的备用计划，因为仅依赖投资者融资是危险的。文章还突出了产品市场契合度比快速扩张更重要，以Airbnb早期为例。最终，格雷厄姆的分析是对创始人的一记警钟，提醒他们优先考虑可持续性和适应性而非鲁莽增长。
best_quote_en: The reason I want to know first whether a startup is default alive or default dead is that the rest of the conversation depends on the answer.
best_quote_zh: 我想先了解一家初创公司是否默认存活或死亡，是因为接下来的对话取决于这个答案。

title: Uncommon Utilitarianism #3: Bounded Utility Functions
title_zh: 不常见的功利主义#3：有界效用函数
summary_en: The article explores the concept of bounded utility functions through a mathematical proof by Vann McGee, which shows that agents with unbounded utility functions are vulnerable to Dutch Books. The author discusses the implications of this proof, including the trilemma it presents: agents must either defy reasonable epistemic assumptions, adopt bounded utility functions, or do something else unconventional. The article delves into various paradoxes such as Pascal's Wager and Pascal's Mugging, highlighting the absurdities and exploitative potential of unbounded utility functions. The author argues for the practical and ontological benefits of bounded utility functions, suggesting that they provide clarity and prevent agents from being easily exploited. The discussion extends to real-world applications and the intuitive understanding of utility maximization, making a compelling case for the adoption of bounded utility functions.
summary_zh: 文章通过Vann McGee的数学证明探讨了有界效用函数的概念，证明了无界效用函数的代理易受荷兰书商利用。作者讨论了该证明的含义，包括三难推理：代理必须违背合理的认识论假设、采用有界效用函数或采取其他不寻常的行动。文章深入探讨了帕斯卡赌注和帕斯卡勒索等各种悖论，指出无界效用函数的荒谬之处和被剥削的可能性。作者主张有界效用函数的实际和本体论益处，认为它们能提供清晰性并防止代理被轻易利用。讨论延伸到现实世界应用和效用最大化的直观理解，为采用有界效用函数提出了有说服力的论据。
best_quote_en: This fact isn't quite explained by my concept of Sublinear Utility in Population despite that addressing utility functions asymptoting to some fixed value.
best_quote_zh: 这一事实并不能完全由我的“人口中的次线性效用”概念解释，尽管该概念涉及效用函数趋近于某个固定值。

title: Gideon Lewis-Kraus on Rebecca West’s “The Crown Versus William Joyce”
title_zh: 吉迪恩·刘易斯-克劳斯评雷贝卡·韦斯特的《王冠诉威廉·乔伊斯》
summary_en: Gideon Lewis-Kraus delves into Rebecca West's 1946 account of William Joyce's trial, exploring her unique approach to courtroom reportage as dramatic criticism. West's anthropological and psychoanalytic lens reveals the universal themes of betrayal and resentment that drove Joyce, a second-tier fascist broadcaster, to his downfall. The piece reflects on West's literary legacy, her sharp wit, and her ability to find pathos in even the most despicable figures. Lewis-Kraus draws parallels between Joyce's populist resentment and modern political dynamics, offering a nuanced analysis of West's enduring relevance.
summary_zh: 吉迪恩·刘易斯-克劳斯深入探讨了雷贝卡·韦斯特对威廉·乔伊斯审判的报导，展现其将法庭戏剧化的独特视角。韦斯特以人类学与精神分析的视角揭示了背叛与怨恨的普世主题，使这一二流法西斯广播员走向毁灭。文章反思了韦斯特的文学遗产、她的犀利幽默，以及在最可憎的人物身上发现悲剧性的能力。作者将乔伊斯的民粹主义怨恨与当代政治动态相联系，呈现了韦斯特持久的相关性。
best_quote_en: What could the little man do—since he so passionately desired to exercise authority and neither this nor any other sane state would give it to him—but use his trick of gathering together luckless fellows to overturn the state and substitute a mad one?
best_quote_zh: 既然他如此热切地渴望行使权力，而这个或任何其他正常的国家都不肯给予他，这小个子男人还能做什么？除了使用他的伎俩，聚集不幸的人们来推翻国家，代之以疯狂的国家。

title: The Strength of Being Misunderstood
title_zh: 被误解的力量
summary_en: This insightful piece challenges the conventional advice about not caring what others think. The author argues that caring selectively and strategically about opinions—especially on a long-term horizon—can be a strength. By focusing on long-term validation rather than immediate approval, individuals can maintain their integrity while working on important, non-consensus ideas. The piece highlights how being misunderstood can create space for innovation and problem-solving that might otherwise go unaddressed. It's a refreshing perspective on status, reputation, and the courage to stand by one's convictions.
summary_zh: 这篇文章挑战了常规建议，认为不在意别人的看法并非全然正确。作者提出，有选择地、战略性地关注他人意见—尤其是长期视角—可以成为一种力量。通过关注长期认可而非短期认可，个人可以保持诚信，同时致力于重要但非共识的想法。文章强调，被误解可以为创新和解决问题创造空间，否则这些可能不会被关注。这是一种关于地位、声誉和坚持信念勇气的全新视角。
best_quote_en: The most impressive people I know care a lot about what people think, even people whose opinions they really shouldn’t value. But what makes them unusual is that they generally care about other people’s opinions on a very long time horizon—as long as the history books get it right, they take some pride in letting the newspapers get it wrong.
best_quote_zh: 我认识的最出色的人非常在意别人的看法，即使是那些他们不该在意的人的看法。但让他们与众不同的是，他们通常关注的是别人在非常长的时间跨度上的看法—只要历史书记载正确，他们会为让报纸误解而感到自豪。

title: How to Overcome Inner Resistance | Steven Pressfield
title_zh: 如何克服内在阻力 | 史蒂芬·普雷斯菲尔德
summary_en: Steven Pressfield's insights on overcoming 'resistance'—that inner force that sabotages our most important work—are both profound and practical. His military background informs his approach, offering concrete tools rather than empty inspirational messages. The discussion spans from cultivating discipline through physical training to structuring productive work sessions, overcoming perfectionism, and embracing failure as part of the creative process. Pressfield's emphasis on turning professional, taking oneself seriously, and the importance of focused, consistent effort provides a roadmap for anyone seeking to unlock their creative potential. His reflections on mortality, family honor, and the cost of pursuing one's calling add depth to the conversation, making it as much about personal growth as it is about productivity.
summary_zh: 史蒂芬·普雷斯菲尔德关于克服内在阻力的见解既深刻又实用。他军人背景塑造了其方法，提供具体工具而非空洞激励。讨论从通过体能训练培养纪律到构建高效工作时段，战胜完美主义和将失败视为创作过程一部分，无所不包。普雷斯菲尔德强调转型为专业人士、严肃对待自己及保持专注、持续努力的重要性，为任何希望激发创造力的人提供了指南。关于死亡、家庭荣誉和追求使命代价的思考，为对话增添深度，使其不仅关于生产力，更关于个人成长。
best_quote_en: Resistance is the most toxic force on the planet. It is our enemy, and it must be defeated.
best_quote_zh: 抵抗是地球上最有毒的力量。它是我们的敌人，必须被战胜。
